main_definition: Soccer, also known as football in many countries outside the United States, refers to a popular team sport played between two teams of eleven players using a spherical ball. Each team tries to score goals by kicking or heading the ball into the opposing team's goal.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An informal term for the game of football
meanings_and_examples.example: I love playing soccer with my friends on weekends.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A sport that involves two teams, each aiming to score goals by kicking a ball into the opposing team's net
meanings_and_examples.example: Football, also known as soccer in many countries outside of the United States, is my favorite sport.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The professional organized competition for the game of football
meanings_and_examples.example: The FIFA World Cup is one of the most prestigious international soccer competitions.
